vote.title: Authorize Supplemental Agreement No. 4 to the engineering contract with Wiss, Janney, Elstner, Associates, Inc. to (1) continue with the development of a Bridge Management Program in support of the Infrastructure Management Plan, provide design and construction services on minor bridge repair projects; and (2) provide inspection and monitoring on multiple bridges - Not to exceed $501,810.00, from $291,111.00 to $792,921.00 - Financing: General Fund ($249,310.00) and Street and Alley Improvement Fund ($252,500.00)
vote.description: Authorize Supplemental Agreement No. 4 to the engineering contract with Wiss, Janney, Elstner, Associates, Inc. to (1) continue with the development of a Bridge Management Program in support of the Infrastructure Management Plan, provide design and construction services on minor bridge repair projects; and (2) provide inspection and monitoring on multiple bridges - Not to exceed $501,810.00, from $291,111.00 to $792,921.00 - Financing: General Fund ($249,310.00) and Street and Alley Improvement Fund ($252,500.00)
